page.description: Move a dialog to a new location.

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

argument.name: X
argument.description: The new horizontal coordinate of the dialog box.

argument.name: Y
argument.description: The new vertical coordinate of the dialog box.

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_MOVE() function moves a modeless dialog to a new position.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example creates a modeless dialog box, then moves it to a location 3 inches from the top and 3 inches from the left.
